mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, b.id AS userId, a.rent_product_name AS rentProductName, a.rent_product_describe AS rentProductDescribe, a.rent_product_price AS rentProductPrice, a.rent_product_picture AS rentProductPicture, b.credit as credit, a.type AS type FROM rent_product a LEFT JOIN user b on a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.flag=0 order by a.create_time desc limit 5
